product.title: InfinitiPRO by Conair Rose Gold Titanium Ceramic Flat Iron, 1.75" CS812NN
product.description: This 1¾-inch Rose Gold Ceramic Flat Iron is brilliant inside and out. 30 heat settings make it the perfect flat iron for every hair type, and advanced ceramic heat technology evenly heats plates up to 455°F – with no hot spots. Extra-long, extra-wide plates and a floating plate provide more contact with hair to leave it smooth, straight, and shiny in record time!
product.description_html: This 1¾-inch Rose Gold Ceramic Flat Iron is brilliant inside and out. 30 heat settings make it the perfect flat iron for every hair type, and advanced ceramic heat technology evenly heats plates up to 455°F – with no hot spots. Extra-long, extra-wide plates and a floating plate provide more contact with hair to leave it smooth, straight, and shiny in record time!
product.description_full:
This 1¾-inch Rose Gold Ceramic Flat Iron is brilliant inside and out. 30 heat settings make it the perfect flat iron for every hair type, and advanced ceramic heat technology evenly heats plates up to 455°F – with no hot spots. Extra-long, extra-wide plates and a floating plate provide more contact with hair to leave it smooth, straight, and shiny in record time! InfinitiPRO by Conair Rose Gold Titanium Ceramic Flat Iron, 1.75", Product Features:


 * Rose Gold Ceramic Flat Iron: With 30 heat settings, extra long, extra wide plates, and advanced ceramic technology that evenly heats up to 455°F without hot spots, this flat iron is perfect for all hair types
 * Less Frizz, More Shine: Use this ceramic flat iron to straighten or flip hair. Features 15-second heat up and a true ceramic heater that ensures high, even heat for long-lasting style
 * Wavy or Sleek: Whether you want to add volume and flip or create pin-straight styles, Conair's full line of ceramic, double ceramic, tourmaline ceramic, and titanium flat irons have you covered
 * Innovative Styling Tools: From curling irons & wands to flat irons, hot air brushes, auto-curlers & more – Conair makes high-quality styling tools for all hair types
 * Conair Hair Care: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, and more. Our haircare line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, and hair accessories
product.description_full_html:
This 1¾-inch Rose Gold Ceramic Flat Iron is brilliant inside and out. 30 heat settings make it the perfect flat iron for every hair type, and advanced ceramic heat technology evenly heats plates up to 455°F – with no hot spots. Extra-long, extra-wide plates and a floating plate provide more contact with hair to leave it smooth, straight, and shiny in record time!

InfinitiPRO by Conair Rose Gold Titanium Ceramic Flat Iron, 1.75", Product Features:
 

  • Rose Gold Ceramic Flat Iron: With 30 heat settings, extra long, extra wide plates, and advanced ceramic technology that evenly heats up to 455°F without hot spots, this flat iron is perfect for all hair types
  • Less Frizz, More Shine: Use this ceramic flat iron to straighten or flip hair. Features 15-second heat up and a true ceramic heater that ensures high, even heat for long-lasting style
  • Wavy or Sleek: Whether you want to add volume and flip or create pin-straight styles, Conair's full line of ceramic, double ceramic, tourmaline ceramic, and titanium flat irons have you covered
  • Innovative Styling Tools: From curling irons & wands to flat irons, hot air brushes, auto-curlers & more – Conair makes high-quality styling tools for all hair types
  • Conair Hair Care: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, and more. Our haircare line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, and hair accessories

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
